Package org.eclipse.keyple.seproxy

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    AbstractObservablePlugin.PluginObserver  
    AbstractObservableReader.ReaderObserver  
    ConfigurableItem
    Allow ProxyReaders and ReadersPlugins to receive configuration parameters.
    ConfigurablePlugin  
    ConfigurableReader  
    NameableItem
    Allow ProxyReaders and ReadersPlugins to be named.
    ProxyReader
    ProxyReader interface To operate the transmission of SeRequestSet, a specific local reader processes the sorted list of SeRequest. According to SeRequest protocolFlag and to the current status of the reader (RF protocol involved / current ATR) the processing of a specific SeRequest could be skipped. When processing a SeRequest if necessary a new logical channel is open (for a specific AID if defined) and ApduRequest are transmited one by one Interface each ReadersPlugin should implement
    ReadersPlugin
    Card readers plugin interface.
    SeProtocol  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractLocalReader
    Manage the loop processing for SeRequest transmission in a set and for SeResponse reception in a set
    AbstractLoggedObservable<T>
    Intermediate observable class to handle the logging of AbstractObservableReader and AbstractObservablePlugin
    AbstractObservablePlugin
    Observable plugin.
    AbstractObservableReader
    Abstract definition of an observable reader.
    AbstractPluginEvent  
    ApduRequest
    Single APDU request wrapper
    ApduResponse
    Single APDU response wrapper
    ErrorPluginEvent  
    ReaderPresencePluginEvent  
    SeProxyService
    The Class SeProxyService.
    SeRequest
    List of APDU requests that will result in a SeResponse
    SeRequestSet
    Aggregates one or more SeRequests to a local or remote SE Reader, sent through a ProxyReader, in order to open a logical channel with a SE application to select, and to transfer a group of APDU commands to run.
    SeResponse
    Group of SE responses received in response to a SeRequest.
    SeResponseSet
    Aggregates the seResponses of a response from a local or remote SE Reader, received through a ProxyReader, including a group of APDU responses and the previous status of the logical channel with the targeted SE application.

    ContactsProtocols  
    ReaderEvent
